entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, introduced as he is walking through a garden.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: A group of non-magical people, introduced as having garden gnomes.

entities.name: gnomes
entities.description: Small statues or figurines placed in gardens, mentioned as being used by Muggles.

entities.name: trees
entities.description: Gnarled trees surrounding the garden walls.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are talking to each other as they walk across the lawn.
Harry is comparing Muggles' garden gnomes to those in the garden he is currently visiting.
